channel.title: coffeinchat on moench.dev
channel.description: Recent content in coffeinchat on moench.dev

item.title: project: working with socket.io
item.description: CC or CoffeinChat In a project im working on I recently got asked how we could implement a chat by ourselfs. We work a lot with GCP in this Project an so the first tough was to implement it with the help of firebase. But because of the ongoing debate about GDPR we skipped the easy way and tough about the critical stuff in a chat: The live reload aka pushing news to the client.
